name: Silver Cloud Inn Redmond

reviews.text: I stayed several times at this Hotel during business trips and I always come back because the offer a good deal. Overall a well run and clean hotel that I really recommend. Personally I depend on the free Internet access (which sometimes seems to slow down when using WiFi) and it's a big plus - also their free business center is helpful when a few quick printouts are needed. T
reviews.title: A very good deal when you need to stay in Redmond

reviews.text: I am allergic to animal hair. So when I arrived and saw a cat walking around and shedding every where. This was not a place I could stay. I went to the desk to explain my situation and they offered no solution. Cancelling my reservation was not going to happen from the guest agents tone in the situation. I did not stay and I will not be going there ever.
reviews.title: Have Allergies STAY AWAY!

reviews.text: Silver Cloud is a good hotel, close to everything, especially Microsoft. Has a shuttle to take you there....Rooms are comfie, and clean..Pool is large, clean and fun for kids...(my son went swimming with other students attending a special Microsoft function).....GREAT breakfast, nice cat roaming for affection!....Free safe parking.....close to stores and restraunts...we ate at the Desert Fire and it was goood....Red Robin for lunch and it was packed!.....Stay here with no fear!!
reviews.title: A cloud with a silver lining..in the heart of town...

likes.liked: — Comfortable beds, great breakfast included with room rate....nice people, free parking, close to shops
likes.disliked: — next to a power plant...I kept my drapes closed so I wouldn't have to look at it!...Kind of hard to find...get a map on google and follow it!

reviews.text: Had a wonderful family time in the pool and spa. Really enjoyed the in room hot tub and all was very clean and very nice. Breakfast was excellent and plenty of food. Would recommend this hotel to anyone. Love the hotel cat!!
reviews.title: Great Hotel
Enjoyed Redmond's Silver Cloud Inn
reviews.text: Very pleasant stay at the Silver Cloud Inn in Redmond. The bed was comfortable (hugely important), room was clean, nicely decorated and quiet. I enjoyed the pool and spa as well (except the spa was not very hot), but overall very clean and nice area. This hotel is also located in a quieter spot, not right next to a freeway like many are, yet it is close to many restaurants and other businesses.

This hotel was very comfortable with a few nice touches. It was great for a week long business stay. The room was equpped with a comfortable king sized bed, a small kitchenette with microwave and fridge, free internet access, a large HDTV set, a large tub, iron and ironing board, and functioning air conditioning / heating / fan unit. The room was quiet.
reviews.title: Comfortable and a good value

likes.disliked: — some of the pastries at breakfast were a bit stale

reviews.title: Awesome Hotel!
reviews.text: There is a small workout room with two elliptical machines, a treadmill and a bike and a few free weights. There is a medium sized indoor swimming pool and a whirlpool. The pool room has one wall of glass doors which open into a small courtyard which is private and well landscaped with flowers. The pool has a couple of skylights that make the area bright even on an overcast day.
The breakfast was plentiful and served in a comfortable large breakfast room. There were waffles, toast, hard boiled eggs, yogurt, juice, coffee, and fruit.
reviews.title: Very enjoyable stay

likes.liked: — Great value, nice FREE extras that other hotels charge for

reviews.text: I loved the cat. He was unobtrusive, and short-haired.
reviews.title: no silver lining

reviews.text: This was a good value for the money and a comfortable place to stay for a business trip.
reviews.title: Pleasant and comfortable surprise

reviews.text: The Silver Cloud Inn is superior in all respects and well worth a stay. Front desk staff are always willing to assist in a friendly and professional manner. The rooms are pleasant and the breakfast offering is superb. The indoor pool/jacuzzi area is very nice for swimming and relaxation, although for exercise the shallow pool is somewhat of a challenge. A small gym adjacent to the pool has five or six impressive workout machines.
reviews.title: A pleasant and impressive hotel
I'll stay here again
reviews.text: Overall this hotel is a very pleasant place to stay, every aspect reflecting a cultivated concern for the comfort and convenience of its guests.

reviews.title: A Little Disappointed
reviews.text: I only stayed one night during a quick trip, but I was pleasantly surprised by the accomodations. The front desk staff was quick on the check-in and check-out, and had ideas about where I could walk (no car) for dinner. Wireless internet without an extra charge, a clean and comfortable suite with a roomy desk. Newspaper and breakfast buffet included.

reviews.title: It was okay...Not what I expected!
reviews.text: I stayed at the Silver Cloud in May of 2005. To be honest, I was a bit disappointed in thier customer service. My reservation was messed up when I arrived and although it was fixed, it was a big fiasco. I probably won't stay there again.

reviews.title: Very nice!
reviews.text: I have tried to stay at the Silver Cloud Inn several times and each time I go, I keep thinking it will be better! Boy, I was wrong! This hotel is not for me, nor would I reccommend it to any of my friends.

reviews.title: Always a pleasure
reviews.text: Very nice and well-run hotel. Rooms are large, well-maintained, clean, and include free high-speed internet access. Indoor pool large enough to actually swim in (not just splash around).

reviews.title: Consistently good
reviews.text: Staff is firendly and helpful. Pleasant lobby with fireplace.

reviews.title: Excellent hotel
reviews.text: For the price, it can't be beat. I've stayed here half a dozen times and it's my first choice when in Redmond -- which has quite a few good inexpensive hotels.

reviews.title: Updated, convenient, great breakfast
reviews.text: I've stayed at the Silver Cloud Redmond about 10x in the past couple years and am still pleased. I'm in my early 30s. Good breakfast, pool, internet terminal with printer (to print your boarding pass), clean rooms, good customer service, relatively cheap price, and convenient location make this consistently good lodging.

reviews.title: Stay AWAY - Smelly , old, dingy rooms
reviews.text: This is a great hotel. Clean, well maintained, very helpful staff. Free wireless internet in your room, nice and clean pool and fitness room.

description: Business Style hotel located just minutes from Microsoft, Redmond Town Center and Bellevue businesses. Complimentary high-speed internet, complimentary breakfast, indoor pool, complimentary parking all make this an ideal spot for your Eastside visit.
